title: $:/GaoZhong_3/audience_24
caption: {{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-GaoZhong_3/Word}}
remMethod: audi(听)+ence→听的人→观众， 听众
phrases:
target audience: 目标受众；目标观众；目标客户
audience rating: n. 收视率；视听率
mass audience: 大众受众
captive audience: 受制而走不开的听众或观众
audience share: 收视率；受众份额
sentences:
The audience began clapping and cheering.
^^观众开始鼓掌欢呼。^^
One member of the audience described the opera as ‘boring’.
^^有一名观众说这出歌剧“乏味”。^^
